documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 31, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, an inmate roster, and multiple official count slips, recording inmate population counts by housing unit. The inmate roster notes a 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' assignment for an inmate in the HOSP category.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total population of 763 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated July 31, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell.
An inmate roster entry shows a 'HOSP' category assignment with the note 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' and transaction code 'G0000'.
The total inmate population recorded on the count sheet was 763 individuals.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate location and counts.
Multiple 'Official Count Slip' forms are included, though they are largely blank or contain illegible signatures.
